cast.name: 亚历山德拉·佩洛西 Alexandra Pelosi

director.name: 亚历山德拉·佩洛西 Alexandra Pelosi

this_title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
introduction: Filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi travels across the United States chronicling the unprecedented social and political upheaval of 2020 as it unfolds. From political rallies, environmental protests, Black Lives Matter marches and the still-developing Covid-19 crisis, Americans on both sides of the political divide react to events that have defined this turbulent year.
chinese_title: American Selfie: One Nation Shoots Itself
